 090: #cpdef Points circle_line_intersections(Point point, double radius, Lines lines):
 091: #    c_x, c_y = point
 092: #
 093: #    lines = np.array(lines)
 094: #    axs = lines[:, 0]
 095: #    ays = lines[:, 1]
 096: #    bxs = lines[:, 2]
 097: #    bys = lines[:, 3]
 098: #
 099: #    min_xs = np.round(np.minimum(axs, bxs), 3)
 100: #    min_ys = np.round(np.minimum(ays, bys), 3)
 101: #    max_xs = np.round(np.maximum(axs, bxs), 3)
 102: #    max_ys = np.round(np.maximum(ays, bys), 3)
 103: #
 104: #    dxs, dys = bxs - axs, bys - ays
 105: #    As = np.square(dxs) + np.square(dys)
 106: #    Bs = 2 * (dxs * (axs - c_x) + dys * (ays - c_y))
 107: #    Cs = (axs - c_x) * (axs - c_x) + (ays - c_y) * (ays - c_y) - radius * radius
 108: #    dets = np.square(Bs) - 4 * As * Cs
 109: #
 110: #    # No solutions
 111: #    no_solutions = np.logical_or(As <= 0.0000001, dets < 0)
 112: #    one_solution = dets == 0
 113: #    two_solutions = np.logical_not(np.logical_or(no_solutions, one_solution))
 114: #
 115: #    # calculate ts
 116: #    twoAs, negBs, rootDets = 2 * As, -Bs, np.sqrt(np.abs(dets))
 117: #
 118: #    one_solution_t = np.divide(negBs, twoAs, out=np.zeros_like(As), where=one_solution)
 119: #    two_solitions_ta = np.divide(negBs + rootDets, twoAs, out=np.zeros_like(As), where=two_solutions)
 120: #    two_solitions_tb = np.divide(negBs - rootDets, twoAs, out=np.zeros_like(As), where=two_solutions)

 122: #    one_solutions_pxs = np.round(axs + one_solution_t * dxs, 3)
 123: #    one_solutions_pys = np.round(ays + one_solution_t * dys, 3)

 127: #    two_solutions_pbxs = np.round(axs + two_solitions_tb * dxs, 3)
 128: #    two_solutions_pbys = np.round(ays + two_solitions_tb * dys, 3)
 129: #
 130: #    one_solutions_valid = np.logical_and.reduce(
 131: #        (min_xs <= one_solutions_pxs, one_solutions_pxs <= max_xs,
 132: #         min_ys <= one_solutions_pys, one_solutions_pys <= max_ys)
 133: #    )
 134: #
 135: #    two_solutions_a_valid = np.logical_and.reduce(
 136: #        (min_xs <= two_solutions_paxs, two_solutions_paxs <= max_xs,
 137: #         min_ys <= two_solutions_pays, two_solutions_pays <= max_ys)
